name: Kuldn's Arc Chapter 1
description:
-STORY-

The game revolves around a boy named Kuldn. Although he has been gifted with many inhuman powers he still manages to life a normal life. That changes untill one day...

-CONTROLS-

Arrow keys - Walk/Jump

Z - Interact/Progress In Dialouge

X (While in battle) - Shoot Fater Bullets
